data.message: I hate facebook messenger its app that just makes less space to your phone you can put messages to fb app again.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Nikola. If there's anything we can do to make your Messenger experience more enjoyable, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1tPFv9Z. -Sarah

It's shame to see how you're "new app" is actually being used to sell the information you see from just regular Facebook users conversations, to companies to whom are based upon their subject. For example, two people chat about wanting to go to Starbucks. You simply sell that information you see to the CEO of Starbucks, and they then put ads based on their product into the reality of the user's world. All this, without their permission, and most people don't even know about it! But Facebook Messenger doesn't just do that, it can also take pictures, audio, access your current location, and all of your private data. Don't believe me? Watch this video Deekline posted a while back, revealing the truth of Facebook Messenger: https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=767995816572487&id=135727119799363. This second article says it all too: http://m.androidcentral.com/facebook-messenger-permissions-not-scary-stories-might-have-you-believe. I know that I may be too young to even have a Facebook account, but that doesn't mean I can't understand what is really going on with this app. And I also understand that there are other apps with the same problems as well, but this has been the most wide ranged one I've seen yet. - Marisol
